title: How can I Create Crayon color using ColorFilter?
body:
I want to create this kind of color using skiasharp.

![a4098528-471f-4f68-aa73-1c16987c0453](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26847946/39737379-5e5b8816-52a2-11e8-8ff3-1b820570c3d5.png)

Please help me.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
This may require a combination of filters, but I am not sure exactly. I would ask on the official Google forums: https://groups.google.com/d/forum/skia-discuss

The guys there will know all that skia is capable of and what the best way to achieve this is.

comments.author: jigneshbodarya
comments.body:
@mattleibow 
I already asked there, but no reply
